headline: How Investors May Respond To Assurant (AIZ) Launching Its Virtual End-to-End F&I On Demand Platform
summary: Assurant, Inc. recently launched F&I On Demand™, a patent-pending virtual staffing solution that connects auto dealerships with Assurant-employed F&I specialists to handle financing, protection products, titling, registration, and purchase paperwork as an integrated, end-to-end service. By combining proprietary scheduling technology with its Warranty Insights analytics tool, Assurant is aiming to tackle dealership staffing gaps while giving customers clearer insight into warranty limits and...
